system.description: Effect: On hit, all valid targets lose -1 SPD stage for 5 activations. Targets hit by Tar Shot also gain Weakness to Fire-type attacks for 5 activations. If a creature already has  Fire-type weakness due to its base types, Tar Shot does not apply additional weakness.

actions.name: Tar Shot
actions.description: Effect: On hit, all valid targets lose -1 SPD stage for 5 activations. Targets hit by Tar Shot also gain Weakness to Fire-type attacks for 5 activations. If a creature already has  Fire-type weakness due to its base types, Tar Shot does not apply additional weakness.
